name: Daytime Drama
description:
Daytime Drama - the cult classic is now available on itch.io

You are Police Officer Sanya K. Waffles of the Boredomdai Civil Defence. You get caught up in a snafu involving evil cultists, corrupt cops and horrible demons lead by a chaotic entity known as Junko Enoshima.

Daytime Drama offers the following:

  • 10 levels - A truck stop, a junkyard, a humane society, a grocery store and a border crossing
  • A bloody arsenal - on top of your shotguns and pistols, a despair-throwing plasma gun and a weapon made out of the flesh and souls of trolls... yuck!
  • Several crazy ass enemies - Knockoff Orange Cats known as Barfbags, evil politically charged unicorns, sweet bro prisoners and hella jeff police officers. Just to name a few!
  • Bringing Build Features To Doom - Sanya spouts one-liners, recorded by Spoopyscarysarah. On top of that, levels explode and look very realistic.
  • A kickass soundtrack by Roderick Scorpion - a mix of electronic and ambient music custom made for this project. Lossless version can be bought here.

Version 1.08 is out, updating the engine to GZDoom 4.2.0 and with a slew of bugfixes.

Any donations will go strictly to maintenance and bringing on of people to work on projects.
